page.title: 06THE THREE SISTERS A-IN-M
page.content: This stretch of land was a group of mine tips, which underwent reclamation. It has one lake and two ponds. Now part of the countryside is being taken up by an industrial estate. The main attraction is the racing arena.Also there is a BMX course that is owned by HDB (Hindley and District BMX) and is famous with Kellogs BMX challenge. There are nature trails all round the "Three Sisters" and a large wood called "Crippins Wood" at the far end. The recreation area stretches as far back as the Wigan Flashes. The work is nearly completed and, when it is the Queen is coming to see it, as she did when the reclamation first started. Many events are taking place on the lake, and on the track and it is becoming Ashtons tourist attraction.
